column2: Dear Hiring Managers, Recruiters and Friends:

This week Groupon announced cost reductions, which means we’re saying goodbye to some wonderful people - teammates who’ve made significant contributions to our business and our culture. The individuals below have a variety of skill sets: any agile workplace would be lucky to have them as a teammate. If you or someone in your network is hiring, please share this list of incredible talent.

column4: Global PMO Manager Facilities/ Regional Facilities Manager
Global Security and Data Privacy Senior Manager
Software Development Engineer - Financial Systems & Analytics
Senior Manager of Global Messaging Operations and Delivery
